Dart Monkey.name: Dart Monkey
Dart Monkey.description: Throws a single dart at nearby bloons. Short range and low pierce but cheap.

upgrades.name: Sharp Shots
upgrades.description: Can pop 1 extra Bloon per shot.

upgrades.name: Razor Sharp Shots
upgrades.description: Can pop 2 more Bloons per shot.

upgrades.name: Spike-o-pult
upgrades.description: Converts the Dart Monkey into a Spike-o-pult that hurls a large spiked ball instead of darts. Good range, but slower attack speed. Each ball can pop lots of Bloons.

upgrades.name: Juggernaut
upgrades.description: Hurls a giant spiked ball that pops lead and excels at crushing Ceramic Bloons.

upgrades.name: Ultra-Juggernaut
upgrades.description: Gigantic spiked ball splits twice into 6 Juggernaut balls for even more destructive power.

upgrades.name: Triple Shot
upgrades.description: Throws 3 darts at a time instead of 1.

upgrades.name: Super Monkey Fan Club
upgrades.description: Super Monkey Fan Club ability: Converts up to 10 nearby Dart Monkeys including himself into Super Monkeys for 15 seconds.

upgrades.name: Plasma Monkey Fan Club
upgrades.description: Elite membership of this club grants the Dart Monkeys even more power!

upgrades.name: Long Range Darts
upgrades.description: Makes the Dart Monkey shoot further than normal.

upgrades.name: Enhanced Eyesight
upgrades.description: Shoots even further and can detect Camo Bloons.

upgrades.name: Crossbow
upgrades.description: Uses a long range Crossbow that can pop 3 layers of Bloon for every hit.

upgrades.name: Sharp Shooter
upgrades.description: Sharp Shooter does powerful Crit Shots every few seconds that do a lot more damage.

upgrades.name: Crossbow Master
upgrades.description: Crossbow Master shoots really fast and devastates most Bloon types with ease.
